meanings.sent1: She sat on her nates during the picnic.

meanings.definition: The pair of rounded prominences formed by the gluteal muscles of the buttocks.
meanings.sent1: The tight pants accentuated her nates.
meanings.sent2: He admired the sculpted nates of the statue.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted exaggerated nates on the cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak resembled two giant nates in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's nates tensed before the race.
